property.name: Rules
property.value: When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 2/2 LEVEL 5+ 5/5 First strike

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-4 3/6 Other creatures you control get +1/+1. LEVEL 5+ 4/8 Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 2/3 Flying LEVEL 4+ 4/4 Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘Invincible' is just a word." - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap up to two target creatures. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target tapped creature. Awaken 3 - {5}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2}{G} ({2}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 4/4 LEVEL 4+ 6/6 Trample

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?" - Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The elders say Zendikar has no safe, peaceful places. How would they know? They've never looked."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Graypelt Hunter or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Graypelt Hunter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He'll cleave wood and bone alike to carve a path for his allies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago." - Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Landfall - If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Roil redraws the world as it passes, leaving only the hedrons unchanged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Joraga Bard or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Adventuring bards recite Chanter's Epics, never-ending tales that keep their comrades' minds alert to danger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Survival rule 781: There are always more scute bugs." - Zurdi, goblin shortcutter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Tajuru Archer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Tajuru Archer deal damage to target creature with flying equal to the number of Allies you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its territory is defined by wherever it is at the moment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature block Turntimber Basilisk this turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Veteran Warleader's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Tap another untapped Ally you control: Veteran Warleader gains your choice of first strike, vigilance, or trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The shadow travels toward the apex. I predict we will soon see the true measure of darkness."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We suffer uneasy ground, unstable alliances, and unpredictable magic. Something you can truly trust is worth more than a chest of gold." - Nikou, Joraga bard

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stirring Wildwood enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {1}{G}{W}: Until end of turn, Stirring Wildwood becomes a 3/4 green and white Elemental creature with reach. It's still a land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield tapped. When Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, target opponent exiles the top four cards of their library, then you may put any number of land cards that player owns from exile onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Eldrazi hunger without limit and consume without pause.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Whenever an opponent sacrifices a nontoken permanent, put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your pleas for death shall go unheard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Ulamog's Crusher attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us." - Nirthu, lone missionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy each creature with mana value 3 or less. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Others ask why the Eldrazi destroy. I ask why they preserve." - Ganda, Goma Fada deserter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. Create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.) When Dominator Drone enters the battlefield, if you control another colorless creature, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Heartstabber Mosquito enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the angel saw was her doom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Pawn of Ulamog or another nontoken creature you control dies, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before I hire new recruits, I test how long they can hold their breath. You'd be surprised how often it comes up." - Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Emrakul's Hatcher enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forked Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Play no favorites. Everybody dies." - Sparkmage saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just when you thought you'd be safe, in the middle of an open field with no Eldrazi around for miles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice a nonland permanent: Magmaw deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The purpose of existence is simple: everything is fuel for the magmaw." - Jaji, magmaw worshipper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) When Torch Slinger enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Devoid (This card has no color.) {1}: Target colorless creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While we delay, they're on the move. They will not wait as we bicker. We are losing this war by moments as our goal slips beyond our reach." - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast colorless Eldrazi spells or activate abilities of colorless Eldrazi.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each temple is a door to a horrible future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rocky Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Rocky Tar Pit: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
